root.name: bezierTangent()
root.description: Calcuates the tangent of a point on a Bezier curve. There is a good definition of "tangent" at Wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tangent

parameter.label: a
parameter.description: int or float: coordinate of first point on the curve

parameter.label: b
parameter.description: int or float: coordinate of first control point

parameter.label: c
parameter.description: int or float: coordinate of second control point

parameter.label: d
parameter.description: int or float: coordinate of second point on the curve
